message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I want most of it!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I still want a decent chunk!
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the majority!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a slightly bigger share if you meet me halfway
I'm getting impatient, but I'll give you a tiny share if you don't meet me halfway
I'm making a last-ditch effort, meet me at the table or walk away
